goal: Search for a skill by keyword or partial name across the repo
acceptance_criteria: Search matches against skill directory names and skill.json goal fields
Results include skill name, goal, and absolute path for quick identification

features.name: Name Search
features.test_scenario: Given query 'memory', When use-skill/find is invoked, Then skills with 'memory' in directory name are returned
features.expected_result: configure-memory-bank is listed with its goal

features.name: Goal Search
features.test_scenario: Given query 'greeting', When use-skill/find is invoked, Then skills with 'greeting' in their goal field are returned
